summary: I have made a tutorial on how to  make static armors as there aren't any here on the Nexus that I know of. Hopefully this tutorial will help you guys make static armors for you own mods! :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#8064a2][b][size=5]Making Static Armors For Skyrim[/size][/b]
[/color]
[size=4][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][b][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]I have made a tutorial on how to  make static armors as there aren't any here on the Nexus that I know of. Hopefully this tutorial will help you guys make static armors for you own mods! :)[/size][/color][/font][/font][/b]
[color=#efefef]Please ENDORSE if this tutorial helped you. *^_^*[/color]
[color=#efefef]
The tutorial is available for download as a PDF file which requires [/color][/size][font=Palatino Linotype][b][url=https://acrobat.adobe.com/us/en/products/pdf-reader.html][size=3][color=#31859b]Adobe PDF Reader[/color][color=#fff2cc].[/color][/size]

[/url][/b][/font][size=4][color=#efefef]I have also made a video that explains the process.[/color]


[/size][b][youtube]4ojLer8bqJ4[/youtube]
[/b]



[font=Garamond][size=6][color=#4bacc6]*[url=http://zyliceliddell.weebly.com/#/]Visit Website For All Of My Mods & Resources![/url][/color][/size][/font]

[/font]
[/center]
author: Zylice
